ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mvlladdd.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | mvlladdd.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | mvlladdd.3 | |- ( ph -> ( A + B ) = C ) |
| 4 | 2, 1 | #P_pncand | |- ( ph -> ( ( B + A ) - A ) = B ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_addcomd | |- ( ph -> ( A + B ) = ( B + A ) ) |
| 6 | 5, 3 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ph -> ( B + A ) = C ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( B + A ) - A ) = ( C - A ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ph -> B = ( C - A ) ) |
